user_query: I'm planning a dinner party for my friends and I need some recipe ideas. Can you suggest some delicious chicken soup recipes with a maximum cooking time of 2 hours? Also, I want to know the USDA plant hardiness zone for my zip code 90210.

TaskList.description: Fetch chicken soup recipes with a maximum cooking time of 2 hours.
Determine the USDA plant hardiness zone for the zip code 90210.
